sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import BaseFilters from"./BaseFilters";var COLOR_FILTER_CONST=[100,28,210,.03],BRIGHTNESS_CONST=.1;function Willow(a){for(var b=a.data,c=b.length,d=0;d<c;d+=4){var e=BaseFilters.grayscale([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]]),f=_slicedToArray(e,3);b[d]=f[0],b[d+1]=f[1],b[d+2]=f[2];var g=BaseFilters.colorFilter([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],COLOR_FILTER_CONST),h=_slicedToArray(g,3);b[d]=h[0],b[d+1]=h[1],b[d+2]=h[2];var j=BaseFilters.brightness([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],BRIGHTNESS_CONST),k=_slicedToArray(j,3);b[d]=k[0],b[d+1]=k[1],b[d+2]=k[2]}}export default Willow;
